title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, September 27, 2020
description: It's the 75th birthday of Kay Ryan (1945), who said, "Poems should leave you feeling freer and not more burdened."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the 75th birthday of Kay Ryan (1945), who said, "Poems should leave you feeling freer and not more burdened."
